column5: We very recently remodeled this adorable 3 bedroom (1 bonus room) 2 bathroom home in the heart of Fort Worth's cultural district. Walking distance from Will Rogers, Science and History Museum, Cowgirl Hall of Fame, Kimbell, Modern and, Amon Carter Museums, UNT Health Science Center, 1.5 Miles from Montgomery Plaza and 7th street area, 3.8 miles to downtown, 4 miles to TCU.
